discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Application control and SSH Inspection are handled by the IPS Engine

Selected Answer: B
The answer could be on page 239 and page 250

Selected Answer: B
B. Intrusion prevention system engine

Selected Answer: B
IPS Engine
Correct answer is A.

Selected Answer: B
It's B: 
Also:
Unlike other forms of security profiles, such as web filtering or antivirus, application control is not applied by a 
proxy. It uses an IPS engine to analyze network traffic and detect application traffic, even if the application is 
using standard or non-standard protocols and ports. It doesnâ€™t operate using built-in protocol states. It 
matches patterns in the entire byte stream of the packet, and then looks for patterns.

Selected Answer: B
IPS engine
B correct answer

questions.question_text: Which engine handles application control traffic on the next-generation firewall (NGFW) FortiGate?

config vpn ssl settings

Timers can also help to mitigate DoS attacks with SSL VPN caused by partial HTTP requests.

login-timeout and dtls-hello-timeout are for help with high latency connections

questions.question_text:
A FortiGate administrator is required to reduce the attack surface on the SSL VPN portal.

Which SSL timer can you use to mitigate a denial of service (DoS) attack?

A FortiGate firewall policy is configured with active authentication however, the user cannot authenticate when accessing a website.

Which protocol must FortiGate allow even though the user cannot authenticate?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
DNS is required for authentication

Selected Answer: B
B it's DNS
B. DNS. Even if the user cannot authenticate, DNS traffic must be allowed to ensure that domain name resolution can occur, which is essential for accessing websites
B correct

choices.A: On the Static URL Filter configuration set Type to Simple
choices.B: On the FortiGuard Category Based Filter configuration set Action to Warning for Social Networking
choices.C: On the Static URL Filter configuration set Action to Monitor
choices.D: On the Static URL Filter configuration set Action to Exempt

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
if the static url is set to allow or monitor, fortigate continue to the next filter (category) and will block the connection, you must set "exempt" to stop further filters in the security profile

Selected Answer: D
Allow: Allows traffic to pass through the firewall, but then checks the category to decide what to do next 
Exempt: Allows traffic to pass through the firewall without any further inspection, and will not match against FortiGuard web filters or the Web Content Filter

Selected Answer: D
D. On the Static URL Filter configuration set Action to Exempt
D IS CORRECT
D correct

Selected Answer: D
d

questions.question_text:
Refer to exhibit.

//IMG//


An administrator configured the web filtering profile shown in the exhibit to block access to all social networking sites except Twitter. However, when users try to access twitter.com, they are redirected to a FortiGuard web filtering block page.

Based on the exhibit, which configuration change can the administrator make to allow Twitter while blocking all other social networking sites?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
You achieve the requirement by using specific Peer ID definitions

Selected Answer: A
A. Peer ID
A IS CORRECT
A correct

There are multiple dial-up IPsec VPNs configured in aggressive mode on the HQ FortiGate. The requirement is to connect dial-up users to their respective department VPN tunnels.

Which phase 1 setting you can configure to match the user to the tunnel?
